text: Finally, according to the cable, last week the turtle reached the finish line. At a press conference, he said modestly that he was always afraid of losing, because his opponent kept stepping on his heels. For about a tenth of a trillionth of a second afterwards, as an arrow and cursing Zenon of Elea, came Achilles. FIN
title: La tortuga y Aquiles
author: Augusto Monterroso
